title: How to decrypt cocos2d luac type?
content:
I am new with IDA and cocos2d. Since I have learned how to decrypt cocos2d Lua file, I found xxtea tool with Sign and Key and how to find Sign header in some game in Lua file.

But that method does not work with this game - Six Path Legendï¼šRevenge (size 869.7MB): Link

The Luac file sign starts with ..C6E@.. header, but cannot find it in IDA.

How can we decrypt it?

  • Lib file(libcocos2dlua.so, file size 9.45MB): Download link

  • Luac file(main.luac, file size 3.63KB): Download link

comments.text: did you find an answer? I'm also looking to solve this. (my discord Frost#9657)
